short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy reading Wikipedia with a comfortable dark mode theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Chrome extension that converts Wikipedia pages into a dark mode theme, making it more comfortable for long-term reading. The extension is designed to improve readability and reduce eye strain.
